title: BusLine schema.
description: a bus line in which there are bus stops (mandatory) and buses (optional).

refBusStops.title: LocationCoordinates schema.
refBusStops.description: The list of all bus stops belonging to the bus line

shortID.description: The ID of the bus line

localID.description: The local ID (shorter form) of the bus line

name.description: The name of the bus line

refStartBusStop.description: The starting stop of the bus line

refEndBusStop.description: The ending stop of the bus line

busLineType.description: The type of the buses that run on the bus line

startTime.description: The starting time from which the bus line operates in ISO 8601 date and time format

endTime.description: The ending time until which the bus line operates, in ISO 8601 date and time format

intervalNorm.description: The interval of buses arrival at a bus stop along the bus line in normal days, in ISO 8601 duration format

intervalHoli.description: The interval of buses arrival at a bus stop along the bus line in holidays, in ISO 8601 duration format

intervalPeak.description: The interval of buses arrival at a bus stop along the bus line at rush hour, in ISO 8601 duration format (e.g. P3Y6M4DT12H30M5S)

dateModified.description: The dateTime when the data has been last modified
